The value of MSH.1 (Field Separator) SHALL be '|'.
The value of MSH.2 (Encoding Characters) SHALL be '^~\&'.
The value of MSH.7.1 (Time) SHALL be formatted with YYYYMMDD.
The value of MSH.15 (Accept Acknowledgment Type) SHALL be 'ER'.
The value of MSH.16 (Application Acknowledgment Type) SHALL be 'AL'.
The value of MSH.1 (Field Separator) SHALL be 'Z22'.
The value of MSH.2 (Encoding Characters) SHALL be 'CDCPHINVS'.
The value of PID.1 (Set ID - PID) SHALL be '1'.
The value of PID.7.1 (Time) SHALL be formatted with YYYYMMDD.
If the value of PID.30 (Patient Death Indicator) is 'Y'.
If PD1.12 (Protection Indicator) is valued.
If PD1.16 (Immunization Registry Status) is valued.
If PD1.11 (Publicity Code) is valued.
The value of ORC.1 (Order Control) SHALL be 'RE'.
The value of RXA.1 (Give Sub-ID Counter) SHALL be '0'.
The value of RXA.1 (Give Sub-ID Counter) SHALL be '1'.
The value of RXA.3.1 (Time) SHALL be formatted with YYYYMMDD.
RXA.3.1 (Time) SHALL be identical to the RXA.4.1 (Time).
If the value of RXA.20 (Completion Status) is 'RE', then the value of RXA.6 (Administered Amount) SHALL be '999'.
If the value of RXA.9[1].1 (Identifier) is not '00', then the value of RXA.6 (Administered Amount) SHALL be '999'.
If the value of RXA.1 (Give Sub-ID Counter) is '998', then the value of RXA.6 (Administered Amount) SHALL be '999'.
If the value of RXA.6 (Administered Amount) is not '999'.
If the value of RXA.20 (Completion Status) is one of List Values: 'CP','PA'.
If the value of RXA.9[1].1 (Identifier) is '00' AND if the value of RXA.20 (Completion Status) is one of List Values: 'CP','PA'.
If the value of RXA.9[1].1 (Identifier) is '00'.
If the value of RXA.20 (Completion Status) is 'RE'.
If RXA.18[1].1 (Identifier) is valued, then the value of RXA.20 (Completion Status) SHALL be 'RE'.
If the value of RXA.5.1 (Identifier) is not '998'.
The value of OBX.2 (Value Type) SHALL be one of List Values: 'CE','NM','ST','DT','ID','TS'.
If the value of OBX.2 (Value Type) is one of List Values: 'NM','SN'.
The value of OBX.11 (Observation Result Status) SHALL be 'F'.
The value of OBX.14.1 (Time) SHALL be formatted with YYYYMMDD.
